title: Solid Wood Wall 5 - Hook Wall Mounted Coat Rack
description: At first glance, you might not even realize that Picket is a handy wall-mounted coat rack thanks to its beveled pine wood dowels and beautiful shape. It has five flip hooks, each holding up to 5 lbs., which can be flipped up when not in use, creating a seamless profile that resembles modern wall art. For additional storage try hanging two or more Pickets side by side to create an eye-catching decor piece that instantly transforms into additional storage for all your hanging needs.

reviews.name: Criss
reviews.review: This is the perfect solution to put my daily outfits on. Living in a New York City apartment means you had to find small ways to make a big difference.

reviews.name: Anonymous
reviews.review: I got 2 and installed them next to each other. Looks like wall art when not in use and when friends and family come over they can pop their purse or jacket onto it ) Also works great as a photo opp for my macrame pieces )

warranty.notCovered: The Warranty Does Not Cover Damages Due To Usage Of The Product Beyond Its Intended Use And Wear & Tear In The Natural Course Of Product Usage.
